entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
